products.title: Stockholm Rosewood Pink Roller Blind
products.description: This stunning rosewood pink stockholm roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties, which means you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This dusty rosewood pink fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme.

products.title: Stockholm Lipstick Pink Roller Blind
products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholm fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This luscious pink roller blind adds bold flair, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories, this blind is sure to please. This roller blind with accompanying white components and pink fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

products.title: Oslo Blackout Rosewood Pink Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft rosewood pink roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Turin 25mm Coral Pink Aluminium Venetian
products.description: This 25mm coral orange venetian blind adds a saturated shade of orange to your room. Their venetian blinds are fantastic for privacy and light control, with the angled slats providing natural uv protection. 25mm venetian blinds also offer a slim in profile - perfect for tricky windows and doors where space-saving is important. As with all their made to measure products, this metal venetian blinds comes with a five year guarantee and customer-first service.
